Verses: 1 dhevan Mosekkum Thamadhu Janamaagiya Isravelukkum Seydha Yaavaiyum, Karththar Isravelai Egipthilirundhu Purappadappanninadhaiyum, Meedhiyaanil Aasaariyanaayirundha Moseyin Maamanaagiya Eththiro Kelvippattabodhu,
2 moseyin Maamanaagiya Eththiro, Moseyinaale Thirumbi Anuppividappattirundha Avan Manaiviyaagiya Sipporaalaiyum,
3 avaludaiya Irandu Kumaararaiyum Koottikkondu Pirayaanappattaan. Naan Anniya Dhesaththile Paradhesiyaanen Endru Mose Solli, Oru Maganukkuk Gersom Endru Perittirundhaan.
4 en Pidhaavin Dhevan Enakkuth Thunainindru Paarvonin Pattayaththukku Ennaith Thappuviththaar Endru Solli, Matravanukku Eliyesar Endru Perittirundhaan.
5 moseyin Maamanaagiya Eththiro Moseyin Kumaararodum Avan Manaiviyodung Kooda, Avan Paalayamirangiyirundha Dheva Parvadhaththinidaththil Vanaandharaththukku Vandhu:
6 eththiro Ennum Ummudaiya Maamanaagiya Naanum, Ummudaiya Manaiviyum, Avalodekooda Avaludaiya Irandu Kumaararum Ummidaththirku Vandhirukkirom Endru Mosekkuch Solliyanuppinaan.
7 appozhudhu Mose Than Maamanukku Edhirkondupoi, Avanai Vanangi, Muththanjeydhaan; Oruvarai Oruvar Sugaseydhi Visaariththukkondu, Koodaaraththukkul Piravesiththaargal.

8 pinbu Mose Karththar Isravelinimiththam Paarvonukkum Egipthiyarukkum Seydha Ellaavatraiyum, Vazhiyile Thangalukku Neritta Ellaa Varuththaththaiyum, Karththar Thangalai Viduviththu Ratchiththadhaiyum Than Maamanukku Vivariththuch Sonnaan.
9 karththar Isravelarai Egipthiyarin Kaikkuth Thappuviththu, Avargalukkuch Seydha Sagala Nanmaigalaiyunguriththu Eththiro Sandhoshappattu:
10 ungalai Egipthiyarin Kaikkum Paarvonin Kaikkum Thappuviththu, Egipthiyarudaiya Kaiyin Keezhirundha Janaththai Viduviththa Karththarukku Sthoththiram.
11  Karththar Ellaath Dhevargalaip Paarkkilum Periyavar Enbadhai Ippozhudhu Arindhirukkiren; Avargal Idumbu Seydha Kaariyaththil Avargalai Merkondaar Endru Solli;

12 moseyin Maamanaagiya Eththiro Sarvaanga Thaganabaliyaiyum Matrap Baligalaiyum Dhevanukkuk Konduvandhu Seluththinaan. Pinbu Aaronum Isravel Mooppar Anaivarum Vandhu Moseyin Maamanudane Dhevasamugaththil Bojanampanninaargal.
13 marunaal Mose Janangalai Niyaayamvisaarikka Utkaarndhaan; Janangal Kaalame Thuvakkich Saayangaalammattum Mosekku Munbaaga Nindraargal.

14 janangalukku Avan Seydha Yaavaiyum Moseyin Maaman Kandu: Neer Janangalukkuch Seygira Indhak Kaariyam Enna? Neer Ondriyaai Utkaarndhirukkavum, Janangal Ellaarum Kaalame Thuvakkich Saayangaalammattum Umakku Munbaaga Nirkavum Vendiyadhu Enna Endraan.
15 appozhudhu Mose Than Maamanai Nokki: Dhevanidaththil Visaarikkumbadi Janangal Ennidaththil Varugiraargal.
16 avargalukku Yaadhoru Kaariyam Undaanaal, Ennidaththil Varugiraargal; Naan Avargalukkulla Vazhakkaith Theerththu, Dhevakattalaigalaiyum Avarudaiya Piramaanangalaiyum Therivikkiren Endraan.
17 adharku Moseyin Maaman: Neer Seygira Kaariyam Nalladhalla;
18 neerum Ummode Irukkira Janangalum Thoindhupoveergal; Idhu Umakku Migavum Baaramaana Kaariyam; Neer Oruvaraai Adhaich Seyya Ummaale Koodaadhu.
19 ippozhudhu En Sollaikkelum, Umakku Oru Aalosanai Sollugiren; Dhevanum Ummodukooda Iruppaar, Neer Dhevasannidhiyile Janangalukkaaga Irum; Viseshiththavaigalaith Dhevanidaththil Kondupoi;
20 kattalaigalaiyum Piramaanangalaiyum Avargalukku Velippaduththi; Avargal Nadakkavendiya Vazhiyaiyum, Avargal Seyyavendiya Kaariyaththaiyum Avargalukkuth Theriyappaduththum.

21 janangal Ellaarukkullum Dhevanukkup Bayandhavargalum Unmaiyullavargalum Porulaasaiyai Verukkiravargalumaana Thiramaiyulla Manidharaith Therindhukondu, Avargalai Aayiramperukku Adhibadhigalaagavum, Nooruperukku Adhibadhigalaagavum, Aimbadhuperukku Adhibadhigalaagavum, Paththupperukku Adhibadhigalaagavum Erpaduththum.

22 avargal Eppozhudhum Janangalai Niyaayamvisaariththu, Periya Kaariyangal Yaavaiyum Ummidaththil Konduvarattum, Siriya Kaariyangal Yaavaiyum Thaangale Theerkkattum; Ippadi Avargal Ummodekooda Indhap Baaraththaich Sumandhaal, Umakku Ilaguvaayirukkum.

23 indhappiragaaram Neer Seyvadhum, Ippadith Dhevan Umakkuk Kattalaiyiduvadhum Undaanaal, Ummaale Thaangakkoodum; Indha Janangal Ellaarum Thaangal Pogum Idaththukkuch Sugamaaip Poich Seralaam Endraan.
24 mose Than Maaman Solkettu, Avan Sonnabadiyellaam Seydhaan.

25 mose Isravelar Ellaarilum Thiramaiyulla Manidharaith Therindhukondu, Avarkalai Aayiramperukku Adhibadhigalaagavum, Nooruperukku Adhibadhigalaagavum, Aimbadhuperukku Adhibadhigalaagavum, Paththupperukku Adhibadhigalaagavum Janangalmel Thalaivaraakkinaan.
26 avargal Eppozhudhum Janangalai Niyaayam Visaariththaargal; Varuththamaana Kaariyangalaimaaththiram Moseyinidaththil Konduvandhaargal; Siriya Kaariyangalaiyellaam Thaangale Theerththaargal.
27 pinbu Mose Than Maamanai Anuppivittaan; Avan Thirumbath Than Dhesaththukkup Poivittaan.
